turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: hello how are u doing this morning?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Good morning, I am tired because my son woke me up early

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: oh well i got up at 3am this morning ,watching and listening to the news ,were these chrildren were going hungrey and sick.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: That's sad, it would be nice if children were not sick and hungry.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: she mam it would ,the little things is skin and bones ,they have no money for food and clothing

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: It's too bad their parents don't have money to buy them food or clothes.  Does the government at least give them some food?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: i think they may donate some but not very much ,its so many people and chrildren going without ,starveing and going hungrey and the women over there keep getting pregnate with them knowing this its a shame

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: It sounds like they could benefit from contraceptions.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: yes or maybe a tube clap surgrey.or something.they are just presious little kids that didnt ask to be brought in this world but they here and needs to be cared for and loved.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Are they being adopted or staying with their parents?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: well i think the way it gies is that u can send money to this place called save the chrildren and they let u oick a girl or boy and the money you send will go toward there food clothing and school.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: That's nice.  How do you know if the money will really go to the children and not just people who work for save the children?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: they send you pictures of the child like every two weeeks .and they keep you up dated on the child.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Nice, then you can see it grow up.  Are you going to donate to the program?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: yes mam i am im going make the biggest donathion i can to help a few of kids.can you make a good dothion today mam

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: How much donation is required for each child?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: as much as you can give,theres not a set amount

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: So how do I know how many children I will get pictures of?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: you can choose as many as you want and you tell the manger that is over save the chrldren and tell him them payment amount and if you want boys or girls or bough and he will set you up for the payments and he will send you all the informathion out bto you

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: So if I want to get pictures of all the children I can donate 1 cent and tell the manager to send me pictures of every child every two weeks?  That sounds a sweet deal, it would probably cost them more to send all the photos though.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: so i hope you make a good desion on helping the chrdlern,we be weighting for your response thank you.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I'm not so sure, there is a lot of typos in your sales pitch, and if I really donated 1 penny it would cost you more to mail me pictures than I would be sending you.  Also it seems like there would be a set amount per child.  I feel like I am being scammed for my hard earned money.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: no mam no scam you can pay as little as two dollers.its are moral responisibility to help these kids so pleas i ask of you mam please consider makeing a dothion right now please dont weight every min a child is dieing of hunger
